# generate index file + refresh on file changes

cd original
wf scripts/build-index.php

# build site 

jekyll s

# visit site 
http://127.0.0.1:4000/blog/forking-and-fixing-a-bug-in-2016-3

# autoreload on changes in browser


# use markdown comments

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4823468/comments-in-markdown
